## `react no this in stateless functional component`

### `0`

```

 unknown:1:24 lint/react/noThisInSFC ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

  ✖ Avoid using this in stateless functional components.

    const Foo = () => <div>{this.props.bar</div>
                            ^^^^

  ℹ The this keyword has no binding in functional components. Use hooks instead.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

✖ Found 1 problem

```

```
const Foo = () => <div>{this.props.bar < /div>/}</div>;

```

```
function Foo(props) {
	if (this.state.loading) {
		return <Loader />;

	return <div>

								</div>;
}
```

### `8: formatted`

```
function Foo(props) {
	const {loading} = this.state;
	const {bar} = this.props;
	if (loading) {
		return <Loader />;
	}
	return <div>
									{bar}
								</div>;
}

```

### `19: formatted`

```
function Foo({bar}, {foo}) {
	return <div>
									{foo ? bar : ""}
								</div>;
}

```

### `20: formatted`

```
class MyComponent extends React.Component {
	foo() {
		return <div>some jsx</div>;
	}

	render() {
		return "content";
	}
}

```

### `21: formatted`

```
React.memo(function Foo(props) {
	return <div>{props.bar}</div>;
});
```
